verses.verse: And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> the steward of his house <S%H1004><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Fill <S%H4390><s%> the men <S%H582><s%>'s sacks <S%H572><s%> with food <S%H400><s%>, as much as <S%H834><s%> they can <S%H3201><s%> carry <S%H5375><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> every man <S%H376><s%>'s money <S%H3701><s%> in his sack <S%H572><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

And put <S%H7760><s%> my cup <S%H1375><s%>, the silver <S%H3701><s%> cup <S%H1375><s%>, in the sack <S%H572><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the youngest <S%H6996><s%>, and his grain <S%H7668><s%> money <S%H3701><s%>. And he did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> that Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%>.
As soon as the morning <S%H1242><s%> was light <S%H215><s%>, the men <S%H582><s%> were sent away <S%H7971><s%>, they and their asses <S%H2543><s%>.

And when they were gone out <S%H3318><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and were not yet far off <S%H7368><s%>, Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his steward <S%H1004><s%>, Up <S%H6965><s%>, follow <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the men <S%H582><s%>; and when thou dost overtake <S%H5381><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, say unto them <S%H7999><s%>, Wherefore have ye rewarded evil <S%H7451><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>?
Is not this that in which my lord <S%H113><s%> drinketh <S%H8354><s%>, and whereby he indeed <S%H5172><s%> divineth <S%H5172><s%>? ye have done evil <S%H7489><s%> in so doing <S%H6213><s%>.
And he overtook <S%H5381><s%> them <S%H1696><s%>, and he spake unto them these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H1696><s%>, Wherefore speaketh my lord <S%H113><s%> such words <S%H1697><s%> as these <S%H2486><s%>? Far be it from thy servants <S%H5650><s%> that they should do <S%H6213><s%> such a thing <S%H1697><s%>.

Behold <S%H3701><s%>, the money, which we found <S%H4672><s%> in our sacks <S%H572><s%>' mouths <S%H6310><s%>, we brought again <S%H7725><s%> unto thee out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>: how then should we steal <S%H1589><s%> out of thy lord <S%H113><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> or gold <S%H2091><s%>?
With whomsoever of thy servants <S%H5650><s%> it be found <S%H4672><s%>, let him die <S%H4191><s%>, and we also will be my lord <S%H113><s%>'s bondmen <S%H5650><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Now also let it be according unto your words <S%H3651><s%>: he with whom it is found <S%H4672><s%> shall be my bondman <S%H5650><s%>; and ye shall be blameless <S%H5355><s%>.

Then they hasted <S%H4116><s%>, and took down <S%H3381><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his sack <S%H572><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>, and opened <S%H6605><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his sack <S%H572><s%>.

And he searched <S%H2664><s%>, and began <S%H2490><s%> at the eldest <S%H1419><s%>, and left <S%H3615><s%> off at the youngest <S%H6996><s%>: and the cup <S%H1375><s%> was found <S%H4672><s%> in Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>'s sack <S%H572><s%>.
Then they rent <S%H7167><s%> their clothes <S%H8071><s%>, and laded <S%H6006><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his ass <S%H2543><s%>, and returned <S%H7725><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>; and he was yet there <S%H5307><s%>: and they fell before him <S%H6440><s%> on the ground <S%H776><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H4639><s%>, What deed is this that ye have done <S%H6213><s%>? know ye <S%H3045><s%> not that such a man <S%H376><s%> as I can indeed <S%H5172><s%> divine <S%H5172><s%>?

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, What shall we say <S%H559><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%>? what shall we speak <S%H1696><s%>? or how shall we clear ourselves <S%H6663><s%>? God <S%H430><s%> hath found out <S%H4672><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%>: behold <S%H113><s%>, we are my lord's bondmen <S%H5650><s%>, both we <S%H1571><s%>, and he also in whose <S%H834><s%> hand the cup <S%H1375><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Far be it <S%H2486><s%> from me that I should do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H2063><s%>: the man <S%H376><s%> in whose hand <S%H3027><s%> the cup <S%H1375><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%>, he shall be my bondman <S%H5650><s%>; but as for you <S%H5927><s%>, get you up in peace <S%H7965><s%> unto your father <S%H1><s%>.

Then Judah <S%H3063><s%> came near <S%H5066><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, and said, Oh <S%H994><s%>, my lord <S%H113><s%>, let thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, I pray thee <S%H1696><s%>, speak a word <S%H1697><s%> in my lord <S%H113><s%>'s ears <S%H241><s%>, and let not thine anger <S%H639><s%> burn <S%H2734><s%> against thy servant <S%H5650><s%>; for thou art even as Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.
My lord <S%H113><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Have <S%H3426><s%> ye a father <S%H1><s%>, or a brother <S%H251><s%>?

And we said <S%H559><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%>, We have <S%H3426><s%> a father <S%H1><s%>, an old man <S%H2205><s%>, and a child <S%H3206><s%> of his old age <S%H2208><s%>, a little one <S%H6996><s%>; and his brother <S%H251><s%> is dead <S%H4191><s%>, and he alone is left <S%H3498><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>; and his father <S%H1><s%> loveth him <S%H157><s%>.
And thou saidst <S%H559><s%> unto thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, Bring him down <S%H3381><s%> unto me <S%H7760><s%>, that I may set mine eyes upon him <S%H5869><s%>.

And we said <S%H559><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%>, The lad <S%H5288><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> leave <S%H5800><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>: for if he should leave <S%H5800><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, his father would die <S%H4191><s%>.

And thou saidst <S%H559><s%> unto thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, Except <S%H3808><s%> your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%> with you <S%H3254><s%>, ye shall see my face <S%H6440><s%> no more <S%H7200><s%>.
And it came to pass when we came up <S%H5927><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, we told <S%H5046><s%> him the words <S%H1697><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%>.
And our father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Go again <S%H7725><s%>, buy <S%H7666><s%> us a little <S%H4592><s%> food <S%H400><s%>.

And we said <S%H559><s%>, We cannot <S%H3201><s%> go down <S%H3381><s%>: if our youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> be <S%H3426><s%> with us <S%H3381><s%>, then will we go down; for we may <S%H3201><s%> not see <S%H7200><s%> the man <S%H376><s%>'s face <S%H6440><s%>, except <S%H369><s%> our youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother be with us <S%H251><s%>.
And thy servant <S%H5650><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto us <S%H3045><s%>, Ye know that my wife <S%H802><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> me two sons <S%H8147><s%>:
and the one <S%H259><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from me <S%H559><s%>, and I said, Surely <S%H2963><s%> he is torn in pieces <S%H2963><s%>; and I have not seen him <S%H7200><s%> since <S%H2008><s%>:

and if ye take <S%H3947><s%> this one also from <S%H5973><s%> me <S%H6440><s%>, and harm <S%H611><s%> befall him <S%H7136><s%>, ye will bring down <S%H3381><s%> my gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> with sorrow <S%H7451><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%>.

Now therefore when I come <S%H935><s%> to thy servant <S%H5650><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, and the lad <S%H5288><s%> is not with us <S%H5315><s%>; seeing that his life is bound up <S%H7194><s%> in the lad <S%H5315><s%>'s life;

it will come to pass <S%H7200><s%>, when he seeth that the lad <S%H5288><s%> is not with us <S%H4191><s%>, that he will die: and thy servants <S%H5650><s%> will bring down <S%H3381><s%> the gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> with sorrow <S%H3015><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%>.

For thy servant <S%H5650><s%> became surety <S%H6148><s%> for the lad <S%H5288><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, If I bring <S%H935><s%> him not unto thee <S%H2398><s%>, then shall I bear the blame to my father <S%H1><s%> for ever <S%H3117><s%>.

Now therefore <S%H5650><s%>, let thy servant, I pray thee <S%H3427><s%>, abide instead of the lad <S%H5288><s%> a bondman <S%H5650><s%> to my lord <S%H113><s%>; and let the lad <S%H5288><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> with his brethren <S%H251><s%>.

For how <S%H349><s%> shall I go up <S%H5927><s%> to my father <S%H1><s%>, if the lad <S%H5288><s%> be not with me <S%H7200><s%>? lest I see the evil <S%H7451><s%> that shall come on <S%H4672><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>.
